author: SciShow
description:
Build a life of learning with Imprint. Go to this link to start your journey today: https://imprintapp.com/SciShow and don't forget, as a fan of SciShow you will get 20% off your membership.

It's not just your imagination. Turbulence on airplane flights is getting worse, including severe turbulence that could cause injuries. The reason is the climate crisis -- here's how.

Hosted by: Tom Lum

title: Flights Really Are Bumpier Than They Used To Be (And It's Getting Worse)
